summary: A key to Snow Veil Sanctum
descriptionHtml:
WARNING!!!  If you do not want any spoilers to the game, then do not read any further!

That being said, let\'s continue.

This mod is for those who want to play the good, lawful character, but also want to find all the Words of Power.  Unfortunately, the makers of the game have made options limited, so the only way to claim one of them is to join the Thieves Guild.

Well, this mod fixes that little oversight.

Because lying around in the Ratway Vaults is the key to Snow Veil Sanctum, left behind by a careless guild member (as an example of their bad luck as of late).

Also, the barrier over the Sanctum entrance has been disabled, so you should have no trouble using the key to unlock the door and go looting.  However, in case you change your mind and decide to join after all, the script that I have included will reenable the barrier for the quest that requires it.  However, before installing, I HIGHLY recommend backing up the quest script file that this one will replace.  (For your information, the file is named \"QF_TG05_00021551.psc\".)

Enjoy.
author: CaptainRC
